[MONOCHROME VERSION ALSO AVAILABLE FOR DOWNLOAD.]

yoshino junpei is a fag and a dyke that's suffered much. there is blood in the water and blood in her beaten heart. but pink is the color of peaches, too, and water as it washes blood away.

maybe she'll die today.
(or she'll live to see another day.)

WARNING: THERE'S A STEEP LEARNING CURVE. A GUIDE IS IN THE WORKS.
